languages.text: "Эй, красотка. Откуда одежка? У меня невеста как раз такое платье на свадьбу ищет. Дашь ей поносить?" {n}Одноглазый бандит разглядывает ваше грязное, но все еще богатое облачение. Что-то подсказывает вам, что платье с вас срежут вместе с кожей.{/n}

"Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Эй, красотка. Откуда одежка? У меня невеста как раз такое платье на свадьбу ищет. Дашь ей поносить?" {n}Одноглазый бандит разглядывает ваше грязное, но все еще богатое облачение. Что-то подсказывает вам, что платье с вас срежут вместе с кожей.{/n}

Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}

languages.text: “嘿，美妞儿，你这条裙子从哪弄来的？说真的，我没过门的老婆肯定很想能穿这条裙子参加婚礼，你能不能把裙子借给她？”{n}那个独眼土匪瞥了一眼你身上脏污的华服。你的直觉告诉你，这群人恐怕马上就要把你的衣服扯掉，连同你的皮一起剥下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “嘿，美妞儿，你这条裙子从哪弄来的？说真的，我没过门的老婆肯定很想能穿这条裙子参加婚礼，你能不能把裙子借给她？”{n}那个独眼土匪瞥了一眼你身上脏污的华服。你的直觉告诉你，这群人恐怕马上就要把你的衣服扯掉，连同你的皮一起剥下来。{/n}

languages.text: 「よう、お嬢ちゃん。そのドレス、どこで手に入れたんだ？俺の婚約者がな、そういうのを結婚式で着たがっててさ。貸してやっちゃくれないか？」{n}片目の盗賊が、汚れてはいるものの高価なあなたの服をちらりと見た。こいつらは喜んでそのドレスを、あなたの皮ごと剥ぎ取っていくだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よう、お嬢ちゃん。そのドレス、どこで手に入れたんだ？俺の婚約者がな、そういうのを結婚式で着たがっててさ。貸してやっちゃくれないか？」{n}片目の盗賊が、汚れてはいるものの高価なあなたの服をちらりと見た。彼が近いうちに結婚するとは到底思えない。こいつらは喜んでそのドレスを、あなたの皮ごと剥ぎ取っていくだろう。{/n}

languages.text: «Hola, bonita. ¿Dónde has conseguido ese vestido? Mi prometida estaba buscando uno igual para la boda. ¿Por qué no se lo prestas?». {n}El bandido tuerto recorre con la mirada tu sucia aunque evidentemente costosa vestimenta. Algo te dice que pretenden arrancarte el vestido y, ya de paso, la piel a tiras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Hola, bonita. ¿Dónde has conseguido ese vestido? Mi prometida estaba buscando uno igual para la boda. ¿Por qué no se lo prestas?». {n}El bandido tuerto recorre con la mirada tu sucia aunque evidentemente costosa vestimenta. Algo te dice que pretenden arrancarte el vestido y, ya de paso, la piel a tiras.{/n}

languages.text: "Selam yavrum. Elbiseyi nereden buldun? Evleneceğim kadın, düğünde böyle bir şey giymeyi çok istiyor. Ona ödünç verir misin?" {n}Tek gözlü haydut, kirli ama pahalı görünen giysilerine göz atıyor. İçinden bir ses, bu adamların derini yüzerek elbiseyi üstünden almaktan memnuniyet duyacağını söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Selam yavrum. Elbiseyi nereden buldun? Evleneceğim kadın, düğünde böyle bir şey giymeyi çok istiyor. Ona ödünç verir misin?" {n}Tek gözlü haydut, kirli ama pahalı görünen giysilerine göz atıyor. İçinden bir ses, bu adamların derini yüzerek elbiseyi üstünden almaktan memnuniyet duyacağını söylüyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Dis donc, la donzelle. Où c'est que t'as déniché cette robe ? Ma promise adorerait en porter une comme ça le jour de son mariage, tu sais. Ça te dirait pas de la lui prêter ? » {n}Le bandit borgne jette un regard à vos vêtements sales, mais coûteux. Quelque chose vous dit que ces individus vous arracheraient volontiers la robe... avant de vous écorcher.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dis donc, la donzelle. Où c'est que t'as déniché cette robe ? Ma promise adorerait en porter une comme ça le jour de son mariage, tu sais. Ça te dirait pas de la lui prêter ? » {n}Le bandit borgne jette un regard à vos vêtements sales, mais coûteux. Quelque chose vous dit que ces individus vous arracheraient volontiers la robe... avant de vous écorcher.{/n}

languages.text: "Hey, Püppchen. Woher hast du denn dein Kleid? Meine zukünftige Braut würde so ein Kleid liebend gern am Tag ihrer Hochzeit tragen. Würdest du es ihr borgen?" {n}Der einäugige Bandit trägt schmutzige aber teure Gewänder. Irgendetwas sagt dir, dass dir diese Leute deine Kleider gerne mitsamt deiner Haut vom Leib reißen würden."{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, poppet. Where'd you get that dress? You know, my bride-to-be would love to wear a dress like that on her wedding day. Would you lend it to her?" {n}The one-eyed bandit glances at your dirty yet expensive clothes. Something tells you that these people would gladly peel the dress off you, right along with your skin.{/n}
